meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lauren Gambier Ricardo Pineres John Schultz Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6981.

td.p: Lauren Gambier, an attorney from New York, New York
Ricardo Pineres, a government relations professional from Herndon, Virginia
John Schultz, a computer programmer from Ann Arbor, Michigan (whose 2-day cash winnings total $57,600)

tr.td: THEY SAID IT ON TV
LITERARY NAME DROPPERS
BEER-POURRI
2015 ANNIVERSARIES
DUCKS
PUT IT ON MY "BILL"
